name: Chimerix, Inc.
description: Chimerix, Inc. is a biotechnology company dedicated to the discovery, development, and commercialization of antiviral therapeutics. Founded in 2000 and based in Durham, North Carolina, Chimerix is at the forefront of addressing critical unmet medical needs in patients with serious viral infections. The company's lead product candidate, brincidofovir, is a novel oral antiviral drug designed to treat cytomegalovirus (CMV) infections in immunocompromised patients, including those undergoing stem cell transplants. Chimerix's proprietary drug development platform allows for the exploration of a range of antiviral compounds targeting a spectrum of viral pathogens. The company is committed to advancing treatments that can significantly improve patient outcomes and quality of life. With a robust pipeline and a focus on innovative solutions, Chimerix aims to be a leader in the antiviral therapeutics space, addressing complex challenges posed by viral diseases. Their mission encompasses not only developing effective treatments but also ensuring accessibility and affordability for patients globally.
